post_text: June 27, 2015 at 6:01 AM#1Basic Replace macroCodeSetUserVar $replaceFocus=("Item to Edit?")SetUserVar $replaceSource=("Where Looking?")SetUserVar $replaceSourceValue=("What Value do you want to replace?")SetUserVar $replaceNewValue=("What is the new value?")Search $replaceFocus If $replaceSource /ncSearch $replaceSourceValue If SearchResult /ncReplace $replaceSourceValue With $replaceNewValue If SearchResultReplacing a color with another color, your answers would look like this:Fixture 4203Sequence 30Preset 4.217Preset 4.220Replacing a dimmer value:Fixture 4203Sequence 30At 70At 30FilesReplace Value.xml1.27 kB – 74 Downloads
title: Replace Value of an Item throughout a sequence (or other)
